data.Sentence: --- lesson 17  The longest suspension bridge in the world

data.Sentence_cn: 1524年，一位鲜为人知的意大利人维拉萨诺驾船驶进纽约港，并将该港名为安古拉姆。
data.Sentence: Verrazano, an Italian about whom little is known, sailed into New York Harbour in 1524 and named it Angouleme.

data.Sentence_cn: 他对该港作了这样的描述：“地理位置十分适宜，位于两座小山的中间，一条大河从中间流过”。
data.Sentence: He described it as 'a very agreeable situation located within two small hills in the midst of which flowed a great river.'

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然维拉萨诺绝对算不上一个伟大的探险家，但他的名字将流芳百世，
data.Sentence: Though Verrazano is by no means considered to be a great explorer, his name will probably remain immortal,

data.Sentence_cn: 因为1964年11月21日建成的一座世界上最长的吊桥是以他的名字命名的。
data.Sentence: for on November 21st, 1964, the longest suspension bridge in the world was named after him.

data.Sentence_cn: 维拉萨诺大桥由奥斯马.阿曼设计，连结着布鲁克林与斯塔顿岛，
data.Sentence: The Verrazano Bridge, which was designed by Othmar Ammann, joins Brooklyn to Staten Island.
It has a span of 4,260 feet.

data.Sentence_cn: 由于桥身太长，设计者不得不考虑了地表的形状。
data.Sentence: The bridge is so long that the shape of the earth had to be taken into account by its designer.

data.Sentence_cn: 两座巨塔支撑着4根粗大的钢缆。
data.Sentence: Two great towers support four huge cables.

data.Sentence_cn: 塔身建在巨大的水下钢筋混凝土平台上。
data.Sentence: The towers are built on immense underwater platforms made of steel and concrete.
The platforms extend to a depth of over 100 feet under the sea.

data.Sentence_cn: 仅这两座塔就花了16个月才建成。
data.Sentence: These alone took sixteen months to build.

data.Sentence_cn: 塔身高出水面将近700英尺。
data.Sentence: Above the surface of the water, the towers rise to a height of nearly 700 feet.

data.Sentence_cn: 高塔支撑着钢缆，而钢缆又悬吊着大桥。
data.Sentence: They support the cables from which the bridge has been suspended.

data.Sentence_cn: 4根钢缆中的每根由26，108股钢绳组成。
data.Sentence: Each of the four cables contains 26,108 lengths of wire.

data.Sentence_cn: 据估计，若桥上摆满了汽车，也只不过是桥的总承载力的1/3。
data.Sentence: It has been estimated that if the bridge were packed with cars, it would still only be carrying a third of its total capacity.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而，这座桥的重要特点不仅是它的规模与强度。
data.Sentence: However, size and strength are not the only important things about this bridge.

data.Sentence_cn: 尽管此桥很大，但它的结构简单，造型优美，
data.Sentence: Despite its immensity, it is both simple and elegant,

data.Sentence_cn: 实现了设计者企图创造一个“尽量用细线条勾画出一个庞然大物”的梦想。
data.Sentence: fulfilling its designer's dream to create 'an enormous object drawn as faintly as possible'.

title.title: The longest suspension bridge in the world
